attributes.action: raise the awareness of how people feel by hate sites, which people feel discrimated by, or feel offended
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: close websites that spread hate mail, about religions, cultures, sexual orientation, gender etc.... although britain has freedom of speech there is also the right to feel safe which is a right that is often not practised.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
